segments.text: Oh great ! This stupid computer froze again ! That's the third time today ! Hey Samuel , can you come take a look at my PC ? It's acting again . It must have a virus or something .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just give me a second . I'll be right up . I ran a virus scan on your computer , and it turns out that you have a lot of infected files !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I'm quite careful when I'm browsing theinternet , I have no idea how I could have picked up a virus .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you have to make sure that your anti-virus software is updated regularly , yours wasn't up to date , that â€™ s probably what was causing your problems .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , try not to kick or hit the computer !
segments.speaker: S2
